title: Document a Weekly Toolbox Talk
description: A foreman conducts a weekly toolbox talk on ladder safety and needs to log it for compliance.

tasks.description: Create a new entry in the safety meeting log.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new log entry is created for today's date.

tasks.description: Set the topic to 'Ladder Safety' and list the 12 attendees by name.
tasks.expected_outcome: The log entry is updated with the topic and a list of all attendees.
